<JD_START>
Job Title: Bookkeeper

Location: Tampa, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Want to learn more about this role and Jobot Consulting? Click our Jobot Consulting logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Job details

Temporary bookkeeper needed for various contract assignments

This Jobot Consulting Job is hosted by Hunter Prater

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $24 - $40 per hour

A Bit About Us

Jobot works with thousands of clients in the accounting and finance space nationwide for bother temporary and permanent staffing solutions. We have numerous clients in the greater Tampa area that are in need of Accounting/Bookkeeping support.



Why join us?


The best medical insurance you will likely ever see from a staffing agency! BCBS Platinum PPO with a $250 deductible!

We pay 75% of your medical insurance premiums! (Most candidates pay less than $100/mo for medical insurance)

Dental and Vision benefits

Life Insurance

401k

Job Details

Job Details

We are seeking an experienced Consulting Bookkeeper to join our dynamic team. This role offers an exciting opportunity to provide valuable financial insight and direction to our clients, helping them to navigate the complexities of their financial landscape. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in GAAP, AR, AP, and a deep understanding of the financial intricacies. This role requires a minimum of 2+ years of experience.

Responsibilities

As a Consulting Bookkeeper, you will be responsible for

 Managing the financial records of our clients in the scientific industry, ensuring all transactions are recorded accurately and timely. Utilizing your knowledge of GAAP, AR, AP to provide expert financial advice and direction. Preparing financial reports, including income statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements. Assisting with budget preparation and financial planning processes. Ensuring compliance with all relevant regulations and standards. Reconciling bank statements and conducting regular financial audits. Collaborating with other team members to develop strategies for financial growth and stability. Providing training and support to other staff members on financial procedures and systems.

Qualifications

The successful candidate must possess the following qualifications

 Proficiency in accounting software (Quickbooks) and Microsoft Office SuiteA minimum of 2 years of experience in bookkeeping or a related role. Extensive knowledge of GAAP, AR, AP. Experience in the scientific industry is strongly preferred. Strong analytical skills and attention to detail. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

This is a fantastic opportunity for an experienced Consulting Bookkeeper to apply their skills and knowledge in a dynamic and challenging environment. If you have the qualifications listed above and are ready to take the next step in your career, we would love to hear from you.

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.

Want to learn more about this role and Jobot Consulting?

Click our Jobot Consulting logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
